title: Obama To Extend US Military Role In Afghanistan
text:

All frauds, cons, and shills.Not really a political party any more - just fraudulent money grubbers...Yep, just like their GOP-TV channel itself. posted on Fox Bobblehead Arrested For Claiming He Was A CIA Operative ORAXX • 2 min ago
